Metadata.Title: Require Management Approval of Software Changes
Metadata.DirectLink: Require Management Approval of Software Changes

Content.Data:
Applies to

  • PCI DSS Requirement 6.4

What to Do

Ask management to approve any suggested changes to the software in the cardholder data environment. Document the approval.

Why

A management sign-off requirement ensures that only authorized changes are applied.

How

Have the management sign-off on the documentation for the proposed changes before implementing them in the future.
